languages.text: "Тогда решено. Гонения будут прекращены. От вас я ожидаю содействия в поиске оставшихся от культистов амулетов и оружия".
"Then it's decided. The persecution will stop. And I will expect you to assist in locating any remaining amulets or weapons left by the cultists."
languages.original_text: "Тогда решено. Гонения будут прекращены. От вас я ожидаю содействия в поиске оставшихся от культистов амулетов и оружия".

traits.locale_text: "Then it's decided. The persecution will stop. And I will expect you to assist in locating any remaining amulets or weapons left by the pirates."
"Then it's decided. The persecution will stop. And I will expect you to assist in locating any remaining amulets or weapons left by the pirates."
"Then it's decided. The persecution will stop. And I will expect you to assist in locating any remaining amulets or weapons left by the pirates."
"Then it's decided. The persecution will stop. And I will expect you to assist in locating any remaining amulets or weapons left by the cultists."

languages.text: “那就这么决定了，那些人不会再迫害你们。我希望你们能协助我，找到那些异端分子遗留下来的所有护身符与武器。”
languages.original_text: "Then it's decided. The persecution will stop. And I will expect you to assist in locating any remaining amulets or weapons left by the cultists."

traits.locale_text: “那就这么决定了，那些人不会再迫害你们。我希望你们能协助我，找到那些海盗遗留下来的所有护身符与武器。”

languages.text: «Está decidido, entonces. Se acabó la persecución. Espero contar con su cooperación para encontrar cualquier amuleto o arma que hayan dejado los cultistas».
languages.original_text: "Then it's decided. The persecution will stop. And I will expect you to assist in locating any remaining amulets or weapons left by the cultists."

traits.locale_text: «Está decidido, entonces. Se acabó la persecución. Espero contar con su cooperación para encontrar cualquier amuleto o arma que hayan dejado los piratas».

languages.text: 「ならば、決まりだ。迫害は止めよう。教団が遺したお守りや、武器の捜索を手伝ってもらいたいものだが」
languages.original_text: "Then it's decided. The persecution will stop. And I will expect you to assist in locating any remaining amulets or weapons left by the cultists."

traits.locale_text: 「ならば、決まりだ。迫害は止めよう。教団が遺したお守りや、武器の捜索を手伝ってもらいたいものだが」

languages.text: "Dann ist es entschieden. Die Verfolgungen haben ein Ende. Und ich erwarte, dass Ihr bei der Suche nach weiteren Amuletten oder Waffen helft, die von den Kultisten zurückgelassen wurden."
languages.original_text: "Then it's decided. The persecution will stop. And I will expect you to assist in locating any remaining amulets or weapons left by the cultists."

traits.locale_text: "Dann ist es entschieden. Die Verfolgungen haben ein Ende. Und ich erwarte, dass Ihr bei der Suche nach weiteren Amuletten oder Waffen helft, die von den Piraten zurückgelassen wurden."

languages.text: « Ma décision est prise. Les persécutions vont cesser, et je compte sur vous pour nous aider à trouver les éventuelles amulettes et autres armes laissées par les cultistes. »
languages.original_text: "Then it's decided. The persecution will stop. And I will expect you to assist in locating any remaining amulets or weapons left by the cultists."

traits.locale_text: « Ma décision est prise. Les persécutions vont cesser, et je compte sur vous pour nous aider à trouver les éventuelles amulettes et autres armes laissées par les pirates. »

languages.text: "Anlaştık o hâlde. Kalkışmaya son verilecek. Ayrıca tarikatçıların geride bıraktığı diğer uğurlukları ve silahları bulmamıza yardımcı olacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "Then it's decided. The persecution will stop. And I will expect you to assist in locating any remaining amulets or weapons left by the cultists."

traits.locale_text: "Anlaştık o hâlde. Kalkışmaya son verilecek. Ayrıca tarikatçıların geride bıraktığı diğer uğurlukları ve silahları bulmamıza yardımcı olacaksınız."
